attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present in Peterborough the elderly have to wait untill 9:30 to use free travel passes, recently travel has been extended to include neighbouring counties. Pensioners should be treated with more dignity and be able to use the pass at any time for whatever reason they wish to make a journey to see a freind,connect for a longer journey or keep an appointment.
